parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to use the document setting for the datum tag's display style, false to not

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Display style as defined in swDatumDisplayType_e

title: IDatumTag.SetDisplayStyle
description: Sets the display style of this datum tag.
signature:
System.Boolean SetDisplayStyle( 
   System.Boolean
UseDoc
,
   System.Int32
Style
)

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to use the document setting for the datum tag's display style, false to not

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Display style as defined in swDatumDisplayType_e

returns: True if the specified display style is set, false if not
